original: 回復時間：$Skill_CD(2716)@在武將四周，召喚出10名先登死士，攻擊附近的敵人。先登死士屬性體力值：$Soldier_HP(1281)@武力值：$Soldier_Str(1281)@
text: Response time:  $Skill_CD(2716)@ Around the generals, summoned 10 first-dead soldiers to attack nearby enemies. The physical strength of the first deceased soldier:  $Soldier_HP(1281)@武力值:  $Soldier_Str(1281)@
